title: The "You know what" man

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
* Every night, turn someone into another role, They will be prompted 4 different roles, 3 of them being R A N D O M roles they made and the one being a role of a faction chosen by you.
* You can target yourself.
* Your target cannot die the night they are prompted with the rolechange, due any possible reason.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See 3 people with roles changed by you at the end of the game, you do not have to be alive for that.

desc:
Post 5089
*You know what i mean... its inevitible*
